name: size
description: The size of this transaction in bytes

name: virtual_size
description: The weight of the transaction divided by 4

name: version
description: Protocol version specified in block which contained this transaction

name: lock_time
description: Earliest time that miners can include the transaction in their hashing of the Merkle root to attach it in the latest block of the blockchain

name: block_hash
description: Hash of the block which contained this transaction

name: block_height
description: The number of blocks in the chain between this block and the genesis block.

name: block_time
description: Block Creation timestamp specified in block header

fields.name: index
fields.description: 0-indexed number of an input within a transaction used by a later transaction to refer to that specific input

fields.name: script_asm
fields.description: Symbolic representation of the bitcoin's script language op-codes

fields.name: coinbase_param
fields.description: Data contained within the coinbase transaction of this block

fields.name: required_signatures
fields.description: The number of signatures required to authorize spending of this input

fields.name: type
fields.description: The address type of the input

fields.name: value
fields.description: The value in base currency attached to this input

fields.name: index
fields.description: 0-indexed number of an output within a transaction used by a later transaction to refer to that specific output

fields.name: script_asm
fields.description: Symbolic representation of the bitcoin's script language op-codes

fields.name: script_hex
fields.description: Hexadecimal representation of the bitcoin's script language op-codes

fields.name: required_signatures
fields.description: The number of signatures required to authorize spending of this output

fields.name: type
fields.description: The address type of the output

fields.name: value
fields.description: The value in base currency attached to this output
